attr.title: Ramble Planet
attr.desc: Play as a creature stranded on the hostile planet Badmark, a hostile frontier planet and tourist hotspot. To escape, you must scour the wilderness, ruins, and settlements of this alien world to find replacement parts for your spaceship.
attr.inst: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/ramble-planet -- extract, and copy the rambleplanet11.rpg file to the port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/ramble-planet](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/ramble-planet) -- extract, and copy the *rambleplanet11.rpg* file to the port folder.
